dict.string: WE ALL GOOD IN THE HOOD
WE ALL GOOD IN THE HOOD
Succession has not yet been confirmed to work on this iOS version, so pretty please, only use this if you really HAVE TO. Thanks, -Sam
Welcome to the Succession beta test! Please report any bugs to https://github.com/Samgisaninja/SuccessionRestore/issues
Welcome to the Succession beta test! Please report any bugs to https://github.com/Samgisaninja/SuccessionRestore/issues
Welcome to the Succession beta test! Please report any bugs to https://github.com/Samgisaninja/SuccessionRestore/issues
Welcome to the Succession beta test! Please report any bugs to https://github.com/Samgisaninja/SuccessionRestore/issues

A small number of users are encountering a bug where the automatic downloader fails due to a permissions error. If you are affected, please provide an IPSW for your device/iOS version to /var/mobile/Media/Succession/ and rename it "ipsw.ipsw" (without quotes) or wait for an update to Succesion from Cydia.

A small number of users are encountering a bug where the automatic downloader fails due to a permissions error. If you are affected, please provide an IPSW for your device/iOS version to /var/mobile/Media/Succession/ and rename it "ipsw.ipsw" (without quotes) or wait for an update to Succesion from Cydia.
This version of Succession has a bug that prevents the DMG from mounting. Please add https://samgisaninja.github.io to your sources and update Succession to fix this issue.
A new version of Succession is available! Please update Succession in Cydia
